mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT( PDT_NO, PDT_CATEG_NO, PDT_NAME, PDT_PRICE, PDT_STOCK, PDT_INTRO, PDT_DESCRIPTION, PDT_INGREDIENT, PDT_SHIPPING ) VALUES( SEQ_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL, #{pdtCategNo}, #{pdtName}, #{pdtPrice}, #{pdtStock}, #{pdtIntro}, #{pdtDescription}, #{pdtIngredient}, #{pdtShipping} )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT P.PDT_NO, P.PDT_CATEG_NO, P.PDT_NAME, P.PDT_PRICE, P.PDT_STOCK, P.PDT_INTRO, P.PDT_DESCRIPTION, P.PDT_INGREDIENT, P.PDT_SHIPPING, PC.PDT_FAMILY, PDT_OPTION_FIRST, PDT_OPTION_SECOND, PF.PDT_FILE_PATH, PF.PDT_FILE_ORIGIN, PF.PDT_FILE_UPLOAD, P.PDT_DATE, PDT_GROUP, PDT_MANUFAC, F.FUNDING_NO, CUTTING_DATE, FUNDING_FEE, CUTTING_PRICE, PDT_COUNT
FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON(P.PDT_CATEG_NO=PC.PDT_CATEG_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON P.PDT_NO = PO.PDT_NO JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE PF ON P.PDT_NO = PF.PDT_NO JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON P.PDT_NO = F.PDT_NO WHERE PC.PDT_CTEG='A' AND PC.PDT_FAMILY='C' ORDER BY PDT_DATE DESC)A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT P.PDT_NO, P.PDT_CATEG_NO, P.PDT_NAME, P.PDT_PRICE, P.PDT_INTRO, P.PDT_DESCRIPTION, P.PDT_INGREDIENT, P.PDT_SHIPPING, PC.PDT_FAMILY, PDT_OPTION_FIRST, PDT_OPTION_SECOND, PF.PDT_FILE_UPLOAD, P.PDT_DATE, PDT_GROUP, PDT_MANUFAC, F.FUNDING_NO, CUTTING_DATE, CUTTING_PRICE, PDT_COUNT
FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON(P.PDT_CATEG_NO=PC.PDT_CATEG_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON P.PDT_NO = PO.PDT_NO JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE PF ON P.PDT_NO = PF.PDT_NO JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON P.PDT_NO = F.PDT_NO WHERE PC.PDT_CTEG='A' AND PC.PDT_FAMILY='C' ORDER BY PDT_COUNT DESC)A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON(P.PDT_NO=F.PDT_NO) WHERE PDT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT P.PDT_NO, P.PDT_CATEG_NO, P.PDT_NAME, P.PDT_PRICE, P.PDT_STOCK, P.PDT_INTRO, P.PDT_DESCRIPTION, P.PDT_INGREDIENT, P.PDT_SHIPPING, PC.PDT_FAMILY, PDT_OPTION_FIRST, PDT_OPTION_SECOND, PF.PDT_FILE_PATH, PF.PDT_FILE_ORIGIN, PF.PDT_FILE_UPLOAD, P.PDT_DATE, PDT_GROUP, F.FUNDING_NO, PDT_MANUFAC, CUTTING_DATE, FUNDING_FEE, CUTTING_PRICE, PDT_COUNT
FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON(P.PDT_CATEG_NO=PC.PDT_CATEG_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON P.PDT_NO = PO.PDT_NO JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE PF ON P.PDT_NO = PF.PDT_NO JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON P.PDT_NO = F.PDT_NO WHERE PDT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PDT_DATE DESC

SELECT P.PDT_NO, P.PDT_CATEG_NO, P.PDT_NAME, P.PDT_PRICE, P.PDT_INTRO, P.PDT_DESCRIPTION, P.PDT_INGREDIENT, P.PDT_SHIPPING, PC.PDT_FAMILY, PDT_OPTION_FIRST, PDT_OPTION_SECOND, PF.PDT_FILE_UPLOAD, P.PDT_DATE, PDT_GROUP, PDT_MANUFAC, F.FUNDING_NO, CUTTING_DATE, CUTTING_PRICE, PDT_COUNT
FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON(P.PDT_CATEG_NO=PC.PDT_CATEG_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON P.PDT_NO = PO.PDT_NO JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE PF ON P.PDT_NO = PF.PDT_NO JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON P.PDT_NO = F.PDT_NO WHERE PC.PDT_CTEG='A' AND PC.PDT_FAMILY='C' ORDER BY PDT_COUNT DESC

SELECT PF.PDT_FILE_UPLOAD, P.PDT_COUNT, P.PDT_NAME, P.PDT_PRICE, P.PDT_DESCRIPTION, P.PDT_INGREDIENT, P.PDT_SHIPPING, PO.PDT_OPTION_FIRST, PO.PDT_OPTION_SECOND, PDT_MANUFAC, F.CUTTING_PRICE, F.CUTTING_DATE, F.FUNDING_FEE FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON(P.PDT_CATEG_NO=PC.PDT_CATEG_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON P.PDT_NO = PO.PDT_NO JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE PF ON P.PDT_NO = PF.PDT_NO JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON P.PDT_NO = F.PDT_NO WHERE PDT_STATUS = 'Y' AND P.PDT_NO = #{pdtNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PRODUCT SET PDT_COUNT = PDT_COUNT+1 WHERE PDT_NO = #{pdtNo}
